card.name: Arclight Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Krenko, Mob Boss
card.text: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.

card.name: Bad Wolf Bay
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile up to one target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. When chaos ensues, cards can't enter the battlefield from exile this turn. Then planeswalk.

card.name: City of Death
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after VI.) I — Create a Treasure token. II, II, III, IV, V, VI — Create a token that's a copy of target non-Saga token you control.

card.name: Davros, Dalek Creator
card.text: Menace At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Dalek artifact creature token with menace if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn. Then each opponent who lost 3 or more life this turn faces a villainous choice — You draw a card, or that player discards a card.

card.name: TARDIS Bay
card.text: The first spell you cast during each of your turns with mana value 2 or greater has cascade. (When you cast that spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.) When chaos ensues, gain control of target artifact. Then planeswalk.

card.name: The Doctor's Tomb
card.text: If a creature would die, instead exile it and that creature's controller loses 2 life. Whenever chaos ensues, redistribute any number of players' life totals. (Each of those players gets one life total back.)

card.name: The Eleventh Hour
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Search your library for a Doctor card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. II — Create a Food token and a 1/1 white Human creature token with "Doctor spells you cast cost 1 less to cast." III — Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it's a legendary Alien named Prisoner Zero.

III — For each opponent, destroy up to one target artifact that player controls.

card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Alela, Cunning Conqueror
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying. Whenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls.

card.name: Destroy Evil
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater. • Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Shivan Dragon
card.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
